dialogue: You ever been in love, Steve?
I didn't mean to, uh lead you on. If I’d realized...
Steve, I'm flattered that you think of me that way, but...I’m sorry, man. I wish I returned your feelings.
I love you as a friend, but no more than that.
Dude! I'm not in love with you.
Denial isn't going to help anyone here, Steve. You have to own this, so we can talk it through.
I'm not in love with you! I love my–
Best friend, Quinn. It's okay, man. Rejection hurts.
I hang up. Rejection is hard; Steve will need some time to deal with that.
